name: GetProductImageInfo
description:
Retrieve details of a specific product image in an eCommerce store.

Use this tool to get information about a specific image associated with a product in an eCommerce store. Ideal for obtaining image metadata or details for display or analysis purposes.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store. Used to specify the store whose product image information is to be retrieved.

parameters.name: product_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the product in the store.

value_schema.description: The id for the product of a store.

parameters.name: product_image_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the product image to retrieve details about.

value_schema.description: The id for the product image.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Use dot notation for sub-object fields.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields_list
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude, using dot notation for sub-object parameters.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The id for the product of a store.

value_schema.description: The id for the product of a store.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The id for the product image.

value_schema.description: The id for the product image.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
